First off, thankyou poothaijaa, I appreciate the upload.

It's hard to believe this is the same Tony Jaa from the first two Ong Baks and The Protector.  The action is few and far between.  There is far too much dream sequence and torture scenes.

V6 - It's grainy and blocky and high contrast, but its a cam so...acceptable. Frequent "skipping"
A5 - meh

Subtitles: At parts of the movie, like the first 20 minutes, maybe 40% of the subtitles are readable.  The other 60% are placed against light background and impossible to read (for me at least).  For the majority of the movie though, the subtitles are off screen.  So if you are counting on the subs to understand what is going on, tough shit.

On another note: http://twitchfilm.net/news/2010/05/ong-bak-star-tony-jaa-joins-the-monkhood.php
